alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Guadalupe County; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Lower Rio Grande Valley; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; South Central Highlands; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southwest Mountains; Upper Tularosa Valley; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 12:32PM MST until March 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central, northeast, and west central New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may suddenly reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
